amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase by $37.5 million funds for the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission and offset this increase by reducing funding for salaries and expenses in Federal prisons.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to transfer $37 million in funds appropriated in the bill for salaries and expenses within the federal prison system and to transfer those funds to increase funding for salaries and expenses of the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 321 (Roll no. 577).
